Intro: My name is Abraham and I am a software-developer enthusiast.
Welcome: Welcome to my web portfolio, here you can see my projects and contact me on work proposals.
ContactGreeting: Thanks for contacting me, I will get in contact with you soon.
TimeLineDescOpo: Developing OpoFlash, a comprehensive EdTech platform. Architecting a microservices system with Next.js, Python (FSRS algorithm), and Docker to optimize study efficiency.
TimeLineDescChecke: Engineered CheckeApp, a real-time fact-checking platform. Implemented an asynchronous 4-step verification flow: question generation, source searching, human-in-the-loop validation, and final AI report generation using oRPC and Next.js.
TimeLineDescStack: Contributed to the Open Source community by maintaining and improving the STACKForILIAS PHP plugin, enhancing mathematical assessment capabilities in LMS.
TimeLineDescQaRdrobe: A full-stack solution for EU Digital Product Passport (DPP) compliance in the fashion industry, powered by the Polygon blockchain and Supabase.
TimeLineDescPortfolio: Designed and built this portfolio using React, Vite, and Chakra UI, focusing on performance, accessibility, and modern design principles.
ProjectOpoFlashDesc: Full-stack EdTech platform for civil service exams. Features adaptive quizzes and a Python-based Spaced Repetition System (FSRS) microservice, orchestrated with Docker and Nginx.
ProjectCheckeAppDesc: AI-powered fact-checking platform that combats misinformation through a transparent, multi-step process. It orchestrates text analysis, automated source searching, and human validation to generate grounded reports, managed via an asynchronous polling architecture with oRPC and MySQL.
ProjectStackDesc: Active contributor to the open-source community. Engineered PHP solutions for the STACKForILIAS plugin, optimizing the integration between mathematical assessment tools and the ILIAS LMS.
ProjectQaRdrobeDesc: Comprehensive platform for Digital Product Passports (DPP) ensuring EU compliance. Leverages Polygon blockchain for traceability and Supabase for secure data management.
ProjectPortfolioDesc: Modern personal portfolio built with React, Vite, and Chakra UI. Features internationalization (i18n), automatic dark mode via semantic tokens, and responsive design.
Project1Description: Project created to show technical skills as well as known technologies and projects I have worked on.
Project2Description: Project created to help designers find color combinations for their projects.
Project3Description: A robust desktop application for managing airport operations, including flight scheduling and gate assignments. Built with Java (Swing/JDBC) and MySQL, featuring a clean graphical interface and secure database integration.
Project4Description: A full-stack solution for EU Digital Product Passport (DPP) compliance in the fashion industry, powered by the Polygon blockchain and Supabase. It ensures transparency and traceability of a product's lifecycle.
Project5Description: A sleek task management application with real-time synchronization. Built with React and Firebase, it features secure user authentication and persistent cloud storage for task data.
Project6Description: Solidity Smart Contract deployed on Polygon (Amoy) to immutably record garment data, ensuring the veracity of product passports.
HeroSlogan: If you can imagine it, you can code it
HeroTitle: Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative and scalable solutions. Welcome to my portfolio!
